sentences: Ma olen sellele mehele juba kirja saatnud.
Saatnud on palju aega selle projekti kallal.
context: The word 'saatnud' is the past active participle of the verb 'saata', meaning 'to send'. It indicates that someone has already sent something. In English, it’s commonly used to describe actions completed in the past, like ‘I have sent the email’ or ‘He had dispatched the package’.
